name: The AK-40s
description:
A not-so-noir game about speedrun, guys in tuxedo and thought-provoking pannels. A chaotic game for chaotic people. Remembers, everything is temporary (majorly your time playing this...)

...whatever the hell that means.



A game by the WAWNA Team:

Killers_BG1 - Leading Coder, 3d Modeler

OXY - Leading Game Designer

Staintocton - Leading Composer/Sound Designer, Voice of Drunk Announcer and Main Character, 2d Artist

Zeld - Leading Main Menu Designer/Artist

Special thanks to our playtesters:
Zeld
